https://github.com/Metalloriff/MotifyMod.name: Album Accent Color As Primary Theme Color
https://github.com/Metalloriff/MotifyMod.description: Sets the '--primary-color' theme setting to the most vibrant color of the current album cover. Requires any theme with a primary color.
https://github.com/Metalloriff/MotifyMod.creator: Metalloriff

https://github.com/Metalloriff/MotifyMod.name: Experiments Button
https://github.com/Metalloriff/MotifyMod.description: Adds an 'Experiments' button to the user profile dropdown menu.
https://github.com/Metalloriff/MotifyMod.creator: Metalloriff

https://github.com/Metalloriff/MotifyMod.name: Chemotherapy
https://github.com/Metalloriff/MotifyMod.description:
Cures the cancer caused by the default Spotify theme.
NOTE: Cannot cure cancer caused by other sources.
WARNING: Looking at the code may re-introduce the cancer.
https://github.com/Metalloriff/MotifyMod.creator: Metalloriff

https://github.com/Metalloriff/MotifyMod.name: Titlebar Theme Fix
https://github.com/Metalloriff/MotifyMod.description: Adds a titlebar that matches the unthemed titlebar buttons.
https://github.com/Metalloriff/MotifyMod.creator: Metalloriff
